comment.body: I'm interested in seeing the video about SSB (as it's one of the systems mentioned [here](http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Ctjcvfovq6d1JWEGvM1JovCym4H6Es33L/?Post:6:Big+comparison+of+secure+/+anonymous+/+decentralized+/+private+communication+systems) ) but it won't load. Maybe you could reup it to http://127.0.0.1:43110/big.kopykate.bit/
